item.title: By: Son of Kermit
item.dc:creator: Son of Kermit
item.content:encoded:
Been in the same situation and I am in the same situation right now but I realised something.

I am more mature and level headed now, sure I still get aggressive but a little bit of positive aggression is good and sometimes it’s good to challenge people to avoid working in an stale environment.

But you have to be diplomatic and know where the fine line is.

Words are so easily misconstrued in an email or IM that it would be wiser to pick up the phone and make a call or take a walk to the persons desk.

The hardest thing to do is to remember everyone is different and trying to put yourself in their place.

But I always use the following mantra:

“There is someone out there who is even more screwed up than the person you are dealing with right now”

Unfortunately the british healthcare doesn’t offer any anti-pretentious-git lube but when it does, you will hear lots of pops going off as peoples heads are pulled out of each others backsides.

Failing that do what opnt does – because revenge is bloody sweet sometimes!
